nodes.text: Star Tours officers managed the daily operations and oversaw the personnel and droids of the Star Tours travel agency, as well as the operations of the souvenir trading post at the end of a tour. They wore distinctive blue and orange uniforms.

Though loosely based on the costumes worn by employees working at the various Star Tours attractions at Disney Parks, these Star Tours officers were first named and first appeared as part of the "Star Tours Boarding Party" action figure set.
